DOC.criteria: Nulliparous woman age 1848 year , interested long act , reversible contraception method . Each read sign informed consent . Women suffer : Acute recurrent pelvic inflammatory disease . Acute cervicitis acute Vaginitis . Current cervical intraepithelial lesion . Current genital malignancy . Progesterone hypersensitivity . progesteronesensitive tumour ( e.g . breast tumour ) . Abnormal vaginal bleeding . Congenital acquire uterine anomaly . Distorted uterine cavity e.g . fibroid polyp . Impaired liver function , liver tumour . Known hypersensitivity active substance excipients Jaydess . Contraindications Tramadol accord approve product information : In hypersensitivity tramadol excipients . In patient receive monoamine oxidase inhibitor within 2 week ( 14 day ) withdrawal . In patient epilepsy adequately control treatment . Vaginismus .
